name: NewYorker
text: The policies in Joe Biden's climate plan provide a good roadmap by which to steer, even if that map avoids the most controversial areas of the debate, @BillMcKibben writes. https://t.co/Ko4mcjzrBa

name: NewYorker
text: Sarah Longwell has raised and spent millions of dollars on ads advocating for President Trump’s removal from office and encouraging other disaffected Republicans to take action. Is there any hope for the movement to which she’s devoted herself? https://t.co/AnYu6CdDcJ
